#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int solve(string row) {
	int ans = INT_MAX, base = 0;
	
	for(int cut = 0; cut<row.size()+1; ++cut){
		int sum = base;
		for(int i = cut; i<row.size(); ++i)
			if(row[i] == 'O')
				sum++;
		ans = min(ans, sum);
		
		if(cut < row.size() && row[cut] == 'N') 
			base++;
	}
	
	return ans;
}
int main()
{
	//freopen("inp3.txt","r",stdin);
	//freopen("out3.txt","w",stdout);
	int t;
	cin>>t;
	while(t--)
	{
		string s;
		cin>>s;
		cout<<solve(s)<<endl;
	}
	return 0;
}
